title: [K-12] Developmental Evaluation Design for Children’s Educational Websites

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of child development theories, experience with educational technology, and digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners Engage in Project-Based Learning to Design Developmental Suitability Evaluation Systems for Children’s Websites Using Simulation/VR Tools in BYOD Environments, Analyzing Real-World Cases

learning_goals: Can describe three specific criteria for evaluating websites that align with child development stages
Can analyze technical design (navigation, accessibility) of child-oriented websites in VR simulation environments and diagnose issues with over 80% accuracy
Can derive website improvement plans based on formative assessment results and apply them to learning activity design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
